snippet.title: Need to Know - Release Trailer - The Mass Surveillance Thriller Game
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/490930/Need_to_Know/?platform=yt
Wishlist on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/need_to_know 
Pre-order & site: http://www.monomyth-games.com 

WATCH THE WORLD on August 28th. The game that puts you on the other side of the surveillance looking glass. Will you stand up for privacy, or help create an unstoppable police state? 

Follow Monomyth Games: 
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonomythGames 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MonomythGames 
Visit the game's website: http://www.needtoknowgame.com 
Visit our website: http://www.monomyth-games.com
